author: Gonçalo de Sousa Monteiro
description: Estery rum with zesty lime and sweet clove spice. A Tiki-style drink for a full-on sunny afternoon or to lift a dull winter's day.
name: Ranglum
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
